Landing.sub-action: Craft stunning resumes effortlessly with our free and open source builder. Choose from modern templates and land your dream job.

LoginForm.email-valid: Must be a valid email address
LoginForm.toast-rate-limit: Rate limit exceeded. Try again in ${retryAfter} seconds
LoginForm.failed-to-send: Failed to send magic link. Please try again

EmailSent.title: Check your email
EmailSent.email-sent: We sent a temporary sign-in link to {email}.

profile-page.unlink-account-description: Are you sure you want to unlink this account?

security-page.add-passkey-title: Are you sure you want to add a passkey?
security-page.add-passkey-description: This will add a passkey to your account.
security-page.name-placeholder: Enter a name for your passkey
security-page.delete-passkey-title: Are you sure you want to delete this passkey?
security-page.rename-passkey-title: Are you sure you want to rename this passkey?
security-page.new-name-placeholder: Enter a new name for your passkey
security-page.sign-out-all-dialog-title: Are you sure you want to sign out of all devices?
security-page.sign-out-all-dialog-description: This will sign you out of all devices and require you to sign in again.
security-page.delete-account-title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
security-page.delete-account-description: This will send you an email with a link to delete your account.
